name: Empress Bethany Von Shwiez
description: Bethany is a small, turquiose fire-breathing lizard that travels with her servant Gypthell

name: Weird Creature
appearance: Sickly greenish gray skin, hunched, webbed hands and feet, long black spine-like hairs run along its spine and down its tail, long serpentine tongue, kinda flat nose, long sharp teeth and claws, gray lifeless unblinking eyes
abilities:
Can fall long distances without being harmed
Can burrow almost as fast as it can run
Can walk on surfaces parallel to the ground with ease
Possible good sense of smell (tracked smoke from campfire)
description: Unknown unsettling creature found in the mushroom caverns outside of joyfull respite
notes: Flinched and seemed to get blinded by light, even when not too bright
